CNN’s @smerconish takes a look back at the 2016 polls and compares them to 2020’s numbers. 
“The margins by which Biden leads Trump are in some instances larger than by which Clinton led Trump four years ago. Still, it all comes down to turnout,” he says. https://t.co/D9hoW6XNTe
